name: Ijapa
description:
Sorry they may be bugs. the game is made for the Platform one level jam. Started a bit late like a day. Thought it wont be too difficult boy was I wrong.

The game is Heavily inspired by Hollow Knights.

Assets Used : 

Music: 

  • ecrett, Back 
  • VGComposer (page: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/27795)
  • marching dream (page: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/26878)

Arts: 

  • Self made, 
  • Free Asset - 2D Handcrafted Art (page: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-asset-2d-handcrafted-art-117049)
  • Corgi engine (page: https://corgi-engine.moremountains.com/)

SFX:

  • Corgi engine (page: https://corgi-engine.moremountains.com/)
  • Self Made

Thanks for trying Anyway.

Instructions:

  • Movement : W/A/S/D
  • Jump/WallJump: SPACE
  •  Attack: mouse button 1
  • Open Item / Charm inventory: I/O
  • Swap Shells : Y
  • Use Charm 1st Slot: Q/J
  • Second Charm Slot: E/K
  • Third Charm Slot: X/L
  • Interact with Npc: T/Space
